question: Shane Watson, who announced retirement from all forms of Cricket, belongs to which country?
explanation:
Former Australia all-rounder Shane Watson has recently announced retirement from all forms of Cricket.
The 39-year-old had already retired from international cricket in 2015. He announced this after the Chennai Super Kingsâ€™ final IPL match. He has played 59 Tests, 190 ODIs, and 58 T20s at the international level.
